head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STONE, THERESE, (NEE BLUM)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STONE, THERESE, (NEE BLUM)

block.p: STONE-Therese, (nee Blum). In her 97th year. Devoted wife of the late Dr. Frederick E. Stone. Loving mother of Barbara Coppe and Louise Spring, (Lionel). Adoring grandmother of Michael Spring and Tony Spring, (Grace), and great - grandmother of Tyler Spring and Nathan Spring. Sister of the late Julius Blum, (Esther), and Harold Blum, (Anita).

STONE-Therese, (nee Blum). In her 97th year. Devoted wife of the late Dr. Frederick E. Stone. Loving mother of Barbara Coppe and Louise Spring, (Lionel). Adoring grandmother of Michael Spring and Tony Spring, (Grace), and great - grandmother of Tyler Spring and Nathan Spring. Sister of the late Julius Blum, (Esther), and Harold Blum, (Anita).
